react4j.core

Interface Component.SetStateCallback

  • Enclosing class:
    Component
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @JsFunction
 @FunctionalInterface
public static interface Component.SetStateCallback
    Callback function for updating state. Useful if the state update is based on current state.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      jsinterop.base.JsPropertyMap<Object> onSetState(jsinterop.base.JsPropertyMap<Object> previousState, jsinterop.base.JsPropertyMap<Object> currentProps)
      Callback used to update state.

    • Method Detail

      • onSetState

        @Nullable
jsinterop.base.JsPropertyMap<Object> onSetState(@Nullable
                                                          jsinterop.base.JsPropertyMap<Object> previousState,
                                                          @Nullable
                                                          jsinterop.base.JsPropertyMap<Object> currentProps)
        Callback used to update state. Result is merged into existing state. Return null to abort state update.
        Parameters:
        previousState - the preiovus state.
        currentProps - the current props.
        Returns:
        the state to shallow merge or null to abort state update.
